Name: Lord of the Click 3
About the game: Let's do it a third time! Gods, oh yes, yes! As you may have guessed, we are talking about the third coming of the legendary Lord of the Click series - now it is a trilogy. Officially. Have we added anything new to the game? Well, naturally! Lord of the Click III concludes the epic story of General Clicker as he battles all the monstrous enemies of our once-peaceful realm - defeat them all and live in peace again. The game has improved its own formula with several new features: an updated unit recruitment system, a thoughtful approach to leveling, and a visual update. So now you can admire the pastoral-cartoon landscapes, on which only orc blood is shed. We know you can't wait to get back to Lord of the Click with all these improvements! Do not limit yourself in your desires and start defending the castle right now!'
